title: SEVERE WINTER STORM, RECORD/NEAR RECORD SNOW, HEAVY RAINS, FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES
summary: 2003년 West Virginia에서 발생한 Severe Storm 재난. FEMA 재난 번호: 1455. 재난 선언일: 2003-03-14.
description:

SEVERE WINTER STORM, RECORD/NEAR RECORD SNOW, HEAVY RAINS, FLOODING AND LANDSLIDES
